title: wtf just happened ?
content:
well i just got kicked out of class by a male professor saying that my outfit is not appropriate , in confusing I asked him what about it is inappropriate and he just told me " I can't comment on girls outfit but this is not appropriate" and he closed the door at my face x.. I am so dumbfounded at this min like wtf bro 
(Description of what I am wearing - track pant and a sleeveless tank top ) 
Now please don't tell me sleeveless is not allowed cause my other classmates are wearing it too , and what else do I wear in summer with no AC in class and he said I should go change and come back FYI I live 23 effing km away 🙂 I feel so mad lol

comments.body: What dept lmao? S&H??
BCA 🙂
Guy expects you to come in a suite 😂
I mean he could say atleast
Just take the day off... explore, enjoy and go back home... not like a single class would hamper much of your life.

Just another day at Pes, I reckon they don't record lectures anymore like they did during my time (2k19 passout,ecity campus). Now that the main campus comes en route to my office, it still reminds me of the jail days in terms of attendance. Throwback time
Professor: My class My rules
My department still records lool
Bro my Id , bag , laptop and my fuckin glasses is in that damn class , I would have long gone if I had my belongings
Happy to see another soul survived from this hell hole
Just out of curiosity, would a male be kicked out if he shows up wearing sleeveless top and a track pant?
My dept records it but never post it , cause then everyone will know how bad job they are doing at teaching us

My classmate was kicked out for drinking water in class. Apparently that’s rude right after a break session. 

This is what you get for 20L+ for a degree.
Me : my fee , your salary 🙂 but nvm I don't even want to attend your boring class , you can shove my attendance up your ass
There's a thin line between fashion and vulgarity.
Track pant ? nope , sleeveless top ? most likely
Ikr like I don't even know why this college is so famous anymore , they don't even have bare minimums in their class rooms and the immense crowd omg , And the mental pressure they put us through
Well so I guess me showing my arms was vulgarity to him
Well, college is where you meet specimens you can't fathom exist . One of the downsides of college
It's a place for learning not a place for showing your body to gain attention. What he did is absolutely right
You're in a college dude, you need to maintain some level of professionalism atleast( not expecting you to wear suit), you can still wear a normal tee. Not a boomer uncle, but that's the civic sense.

Glad my uni days are over,  we had to wear formals, but atleast there were ACs. Can't imagine sitting in a class full of humans in this hot summer without AC. Would rather be preferred to be thrown out, but yes with my bag lol
True , this prof has tried picking on me before too so I guess I can tell he simply dislikes me
Wearing sleevless = trying to show body for gaining attention?? 🤡🤡

Ohh if you wanna phrase it like that then .. Its a place for learning and teaching not a place where the teacher should be saying you can't wear this and that , well his job is to teach ... And you lol go sip some water bro
is this sarcasm?
So it's place where you decide what the teacher should say right ? Go take a sip of milk and grow up kid
The only thing I miss RN is my bag , I have enough attendance to miss his another 4 classes
y'all survive and thrive..Jack Daniels and JD at Pes hits different
Post a pic if possible so that people can understand better. Everyone in comments just assuming things.

Well read what I said again , its a place where his job is to teach ! Honestly don't wanna argue with you cause if that's your opinion good for you , I simply posted it cause I wanted to rant , if it made you feel uncomfortable you can always ignore the post .. Thank you have a good day ahead
Sleevless ≠ tank top
Oh lol I was almost kicked out for this too. This was way back in 2018 xD.
Atleast you have your phone with you!
Damn, just doze off in the middle rows then
Survive ? Yeah that is why I avoid going to 13 the floor

By track pant you mean those pants which show your booty crack and cameltoe? Would a guy be allowed to stay if he came in wifebeaters and yoga pants showing his cake? 

You are in college, dress appropriately.
I have seen a lot of people wear the same and not getting pointed out, seems like the professor just hates you at this point

Prof probably woke up on the wrong side of the bed today lmao. Women wore sleeveless even back in 2018 when I used to go to college. Taking the issue to higher authorities would unfortunately be a waste of your time here, its best to just let it go. As you said - dude probably doesn't like you and he chose the easiest reason to pick on you.

Seems like my comment made you uncomfortable..
Seems like you are living in your own world... thinking everyone going to respond to your dress and to your rant as you wish and imagine...grow up soon otherwise you are going to end up in troubles .
Lmao wearing comfortable clothing in summer isn't called showing your body. Once you stop objectifying women and sexualising sleeveless clothing, and you will understand that.
Well they dont deserve to see it ... I could should it to people who are willing to at least ask or listen instead if assuming ...

Once you understand that schools and colleges have some basic rules that everyone should follow irrespective of whether conditions and start using your common sense then you will see things much clearly...than just judging and seeing things through your preconceived ideas and prejudices .
Seek help Mr.delulu
I came back to class to attend other subject , he saw me in elevator and told you can't sit in Any class , I ignored him and walked away hehe
Someone wise said " if you can't say anything nice , don't say anything" ... With this I start ignoring you , good bye Mr. Old foggus
Ikr 😭😭😭

I don't see a problem if guys are also not allowed sleeveless(tank tops) it is just the matter of rules. There always will be people who think rules are strict and try to pull stunts. Decent clothes are largely divided by society and could vary place to place. It is not good to always push those limits. Tank top might be vulgar in India but might not it Western society. It is not good or bad it is different cultures.
Maybe the tank top triggered something inside him 🤔
Yes
Broooo💀💀💀
I literally have seen girls roaming in canteen wearing very short crop tops , strapless tops and what not.
Bro I have seen girls wearing  shorts and skirts , its fine , he just simply hates me I guess
I came back to class now , this prof is so chill

why get so defensive ? If the professor called out for dress code, its most likely inappropriate. maybe buy a shawl or something from near by. Cover yourself and attend class. complying with the rules shows respect to the institution and the professor. Professor will know you are following orders and you could be in his good books.
just ignore him till the semester ends and hope to not see him in the semesters to come

Well If I was wearing anything inappropriate then other professors would have problem with it too , but well they don't , I am in another class RN and this sir doesn't care about it , yesterday I wore sleeveless too nobody had a problem , and that prof has been picking on me from first sem
Well he is been picking on me from 1st sem , and now in 2 nd sem too , hopefully he doesn't exist in next sem
damn - goodluck OP
Saw her pic. There is nothing inappropriate in what she is wearing. Track pant and top are loose and she is not showing any skin either. You are just assuming things.
Saw her pic. There is nothing inappropriate in what she is wearing. Track pant and top are loose and she is not showing any skin either. You are just assuming things.
Saw her pic. There is nothing inappropriate in what she is wearing. Track pant and top are loose and she is not showing any skin either.
Maybe some personal issue , you know many teachers are so egoistic and have some personal issues with some students . I hate this type of teacher 😒

why compare one prof with another ? Isnt one prof telling you enough ? If other profs are not telling anything, then it probably means they know some students wont listen. Is asking to cover up too much for you ? Just cover up and attend class.

Sure, yes all institutions have a dress code. But the dress code at PESU does not restrict women on wearing sleeveless clothing. Did not restrict back in 2018 when I was in college and does not restrict now either. You probably aren't from PES. Maybe just visit campus once and you will find multiple wearing similar clothing. OP just had the bad luck of finding a prof with the same mindset as you. 

Anyway, since we do have opposing opinions on this it does not make sense to argue. I wish you a good day.
Be careful after ignoring me in your mind you might end up becoming friends...seems like you find it hard to differentiate between reality and imagination.
He went ahead and complained to the hod lol , I went and spoke to her with my friends jacket and complained about how he spoke to me lol
Well you should have uploaded a pic of your outfit to better understand.

I made comment for her post not her picture..so if it's an assumption it's not my fault...what else one can do in platforms like this . 
Better don't take discussions in platforms like this personally. Everyone has their opinions and if you post something in public platforms like this and expect the comments to be on your way... I pray that reality hits you .
Dude sip on water , hydrate yourself And stop talking bullshit , who asked for your opinion ? Don't like my post ? Then ignore it
Hehe thank you
U go to Christ … I’m leaning towards the professors side
This is a automated message to idiots " go fuck yourself " .... Don't reply to automated message
You should talk to him like sir  i was not the only one wearing a sleeveless top, what was inappropriate in that outfit lol

You know what the hod said , she said " well you know wearing crop top could mislead the professors and then you are gonna blame the prof but whose fault is it to wear it" I am standing there and thinking so because he cant control his dick I am supposed to wear a full sleeves in this sunny warm day GG
These guys can't take opinions they just wanna yap
Is the professor buddhha or what  bhai this old age teachers are very problematic 😐

I Don't think it's the sleeveless but more of outfit on whole and the kind of fabric it's made of. you don't go to a church wearing that, you Don't go to a star restaurant wearing that, even most of nightclubs Don't allow you with that kind of outfit but God forbid a professor asks you to dress better and all hell breaks lose!
They are not even old , they are middle aged but act like people from 800BC
Write an apology letter talking about the sorry state of india

Well its a outfit I go to temple with and you can just say what you want , and please cleanse your mind , now I understand why girls are asked to cover them selves because people like you exist who can't control their own imagination and thoughts
I guess thats the only option left
looks like you will dress the same way... some people never change..
You will never stop replying will you ? Some people never change
You asked a question in your previous reply. so, i responded. You ask again. so, i respond again.
Lol college is run by unchecked regressive clowns istg

People like me try to understand the situation better and give you a plausible perception on both ends and try to find common ground so nobody gets to play victim! But the reality is this is tagged as a rant, and I tried to make some sense out of it. 
PS: If there's something bothering my students I am obligated to address it without any questions asked as I am paid to teach subject and nothing else. Go talk to your program leader or whoever.
Yup, when you can't talk sense into teachers, We just wanna be done away with college asap.

One prof of mine didn't allow shorts for boys. He was the best prof to ever exist on earth and way more progressive than any of us. He just wanted all of us to look less casual in the class. The discipline to dress up right puts the mind in the right zone too.
Eventually it's a personal choice but don't take it to heart. Everything in the universe isn't always about us.

They're pissed off at themselves. 90% of professors are just failed professionals. People who could talk but not walk the walk.
They're mad that their college buddies who ranked below them are now earning more than 5 times their salary 😂.

Profs are on a power trip of their own. And you can rarely do anything about it. It sucks but that really is how it is.

I studied Mech engineering in a college that's right next to the sea and it was unbearably hot even in winters at nights. In that scalding heat, we had to stand for 4 hours and draw shit for our machine drawing workshop. In a room with no ventilation, in the middle of the day in March heat. It sucked.

HOD of our dept walked in the drawing room one day and pulled out 4 people (2 girls, the only 2 in the class of 60) and sent them home for wearing track pants. FUCKING TRACK PANTS. ffs it was 2 PM and the temp was reaching 40.

We did get back at that asshole tho. Someone (who was on the college racing team I presume, and had the mechanical know how) removed all 4 tyres of his car, stacked them neatly next to it, and chalked the axles with bricks wherever one day he forgot that he brought the car to the office and Walked back home.

Petty things like these is the only way we ever got back at these mfs.
